idea: I am one of the Managing partners at Ashok Oil & Food Products. We specialize in Edible Oil manufacturing and packaging. We are on the verge of launching our brand Ace Gold, an ethical and premium edible oil brand consisting of all the indigenous oils produced in India. We aim to to change the Indian edible oil consumption by replacing the large amount of imports of edible oils by India with the oils produced within the country. We also intend to venture into the Food processing and packaging segment in our FSSC 22,00 compliant food handling facility located near Mumbai, Which will also help us provide value internationally with the kind of Quality and standards we follow.
name: Ashok Oil and Food Products

idea:
• Collecting scrap materials online through a digital platform • Imagine a case where there is a problem of selling scrap via phone calls here, we intend to solve this problem via just 1 click sell • Consider the case of the post-sales service industry, a consumer need to update themself through technology with the secured manner of selling and Monitoring of pickup agents via mobile platforms. • Instant Cash withdrawals through our application.

idea: We create, organize, market and sell tech based corporate conferences. Providing a platform for the tech companies, empowering the Tech Start-ups through our platform to network, succeed and collaborate with industry leaders and increase their clientele. We embody authentic human interactions where innovative ideas will come from innovative spaces. We empower the concept of ‘Thought Leadership’, our events incorporate opportunities to exchange through a series of Key-notes, case studies, panel discussions, think-tanks and round-tables coupled with inspiring business relevant keynotes, and C-suite networking programs.
